title: Chapter 1875 - Breaking Down
body:
Chapter 1875 - Breaking Down

Su Yi looked over.

That tall male figure had eyes like the sun and moon and skin like copper. He had a willowy beard, and his entire body was swathed in wisps of blue lightning.

“An avatar of will, that’s all? Chu Shentong, it’s been a long time since I last saw you, but you’re as useless as ever,” Su Yi laughed derisively.

This was none other than Immortal Sovereign Sky Killer, Chu Shentong, the founder of Jade Firmament Immortal Palace. Prior to the Age of Fallen Immortals, he was an unrivaled Immortal Sovereign at the pinnacle of the Immortal Dao. He was also a yao cultivator; his true body was a Kui Ox.

But this Chu Shentong was no more than an avatar of will.

Chu Shentong was entirely unperturbed in the face of Su Yi’s mockery. He had a complex look on his face as he sighed, “You really have returned, Tyrant.”

Su Yi took out a jug of wine and had a sip. “Are you that afraid of me?”

Chu Shentong laughed. “I wouldn’t call it ‘afraid.’ Old-timers like me are just far more keenly aware of how terrifying you can be, Tyrant.”

“So, the moment you learned I’d be paying Jade Firmament Immortal Palace a visit, you ordered everyone...
